hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Forest Temple#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #Volvagia#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Falling Spikes Lower Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Statue Room Lullaby Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Morpha#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Nayru's Love#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #before the Truth Spinner gap# in the Shadow Temple locked chests contain...^ #a Bow# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Hover Boots Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Heart Container# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Hookshot#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
